Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: This was the best used iphone i could find!! It  came in a right shape and no scratches. I love it

Reviews.Title: FAST
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Powell
Reviews.Content: It shipped fast and arrived in perfect condition. It works great on the straight talk network woithout any issues....its a iphone what else can i say?

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: This product seemed to be in much better condition than described. The scratches aren't even visible. I haven't had any problems thus far. This product is great!!

Reviews.Title: Iphone is the most convient and user friendly smartphone available
Reviews.Author: Thomas Lowder
Reviews.Content: Easy to use interface with only 2 buttons makes this phone perfect for anyone no matter their tech level. With apple's App Store, finding fun, useful, or just plain random apps couldn't be easier. I've had an iphone since the first one came out and they haven't given me a reason to switch yet!

Reviews.Title: Why Buy New??
Reviews.Author: P. Allyn
Reviews.Content: After my China-bought iPhone went haywire I needed a replacement. After looking around on here I found the perfect replacement that arrived within 2-3days, looks on a scale from 1 to 10 give it a 9 (light scratches on back cover and metal rim). Front screen flawless and the phone works perfectly. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great used iPhone.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING SERVICE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jyoti Harper
Reviews.Content: I got my phone before Amazon said it was going to be here and it was a good price and in great condition! It looks and functions as if it were brand new! I'm so happy

Reviews.Title: New Iphone 4
Reviews.Author: taryn leigh parr
Reviews.Content: I really appreciated all the help that i was recieved! This phone is everything I wanted and more!I choose second hand cellular through amazon because they are trustworthy and dependable! And will gladly help you with any questions or concerns you may have!I rate this company and product 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Great shopping experience
Reviews.Author: tpddht
Reviews.Content: This is a very good seller very good product provided! Product even better than expected, charger, data cable readily available, the machine itself is almost brand new, and there are a period of warranty, the best is the machine has been unlocked, you can freely use.

Reviews.Title: Too slow
Reviews.Author: Praneeth
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone last week. It's unlocked and in great cosmetic condition. Honestly looks like a brand new phone. But after spending 300 dollars, I got a phone that is so slow.. Slow with typing, slow with opening the apps and slow with every function.Regret buying this. I should have bought a new one from Apple store

Reviews.Title: Phone Quit after 3 weeks!!
Reviews.Author: 2 old 2 die
Reviews.Content: The phone quit working after 3 weeks of use.  will not stay on keeps powering off.  will not stay charged.

Reviews.Title: couldn't be better!
Reviews.Author: kimmy
Reviews.Content: Besides having a small crack on the back side of the phone, it works perfectly and they even put it in a cute package!(= I did not find nothing wrong with it. I started using it right on that day it came to my house. I have nothing bad to say about it. This is the best phone I've ever had!!

Reviews.Title: Stolen phone
Reviews.Author: jodi davis
Reviews.Content: I put my sim card in and it wouldn't work.  I went to an AT&T; store to get them to set everything up for me.  They put in the serial number on the back and it turns out the phone had been reported stolen and it could not be used.

Reviews.Title: I'm Not Enthused
Reviews.Author: Mr Steve
Reviews.Content: The screen sparatically change colors and gets hot without cause. In the beginning I was excited but I'm no longer enthused.

Reviews.Title: Awsome!!
Reviews.Author: vilma
Reviews.Content: The iphone was in perfect shape and everything and works real great like its brand new. Really love it and it came in quick :) !

Reviews.Title: Great Phone - Great Service
Reviews.Author: Larry Knight
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived 3 days early.  Was in perfect shape.  Went to Walmart - purchased a straight talk sim card and monthly card and we had it working with in the hour.  Would buy from these folks again.

Reviews.Title: Luis Jordan
Reviews.Author: Jackie Lynn Pannell
Reviews.Content: I give Luis Jordan a 5 star review!The 1st iphone 4 i received the wifi wasn't completely working,I emailed Luis about it and the response was rite on point.I sent it back, it was checked out and i received another phone (actuallyIt was in better condition than the 1st phone) i believe not 1 scratch!But i personally LOVED how Luis Jordan stayed in total complete contact with meInforming me of EVERYTHING from beginning to end, not left waiting/wondering!  Thank You Again Luis Jordan

Reviews.Title: AT&T; repeated errors
Reviews.Author: bill b
Reviews.Content: I originally gave this seller an 'awful' review.  I had taken the phone to an AT&T; certified dealer to have it authorized.  That dealer said the phone was blocked, probably stolen, and showed me the red print screen making that statement.  The seller of the phone said that was impossible.  I then went to an AT&T; store and got the same red screen.  This all involved a lot of exchange with the seller but we reached some agreement pending on my showing the seller the screen stating the blocked condition of the phone.  Once again I went to the AT&T; store.  This time, and after the 3rd SIM card, I was told that the phone was working but that I needed to get the 4 digit security card from the seller.  Of course the seller believed that the phone was new and likely would not have a security code.  When I got home I saw that the AT&T; agent had been confusing the phone number screen with a security code screen and no code had been entered.  The phone is working.  AT&T; owes him an apology.  Bill B.

Reviews.Title: Is ok but
Reviews.Author: Miguel Eusebio Cortorreal
Reviews.Content: is ok but if i want to unlock it, i have to pay about $100 bucks. 3 stars is my review

Reviews.Title: nop
Reviews.Author: laura hernandez
Reviews.Content: had to returned it because it was wet and didn't work at all.So i don't recommend refurbish products. I just did't like it.

Reviews.Title: Like new
Reviews.Author: ALEXA "ALEXA OAKS"
Reviews.Content: It works great, it came like new. I still have it and have no plans for the iPhone 5. Happy with this one.

Reviews.Title: Amazing! Besides one thing!
Reviews.Author: Manda
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with this sale and the item I bought. The seller was very fast on getting the phone to me and I was very pleased with the phone, besides the seller did not tell me that the back of the phone was cracked and I was really upset about that. Other than that it was perfect!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: More than what I expected. No lies on description of phone. Would not think twice about buying from you again.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Vickpete
Reviews.Content: Great, I have loved an iPhone for about 4 years.  Old one died. Replaced it with this one. Will enjoy it for a while

Reviews.Title: Quality
Reviews.Author: Anna Jesse
Reviews.Content: No problems at all. Great condition. Like new. Had it for a few weeks now and had zero problems. I definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: I recomend
Reviews.Author: olga
Reviews.Content: I GET NEW!! AND GET  NEW SIM CARD FROM STRAIGHT TALK  AND WORK GREAT!!! I am very happy!!!  100% !

Reviews.Title: i phone
Reviews.Author: jose  diaz
Reviews.Content: it is fully functional but the internet signal from my home doesn't appear on the wifi locator matter fact none of my surrounding internet connections can be picked up by the phone and i was wondering if i could return it for one that does connect and pick up the wifi signals. or if i could get a refund//?

Reviews.Title: worked 6 days
Reviews.Author: Reshondialyn Winfield
Reviews.Content: Worked great for about a week, screen went totally black, was unable to do anything with the phone for several hours. The phone went out while traveling out of town, leaving me without any means of contact.  I was however I was able to reset it and resume use the next day.  I returned the phone and the seller was great with refunding.  I was what I wanted but didn't seem to be too reliable.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Shontia joseph
Reviews.Content: Phone works great, used as a first iPhone for my daughter she loves it, only had to get the back camera repaired and that was only $30, fast shipping great seller thanks again

Reviews.Title: Malfunctioned immediately
Reviews.Author: Karl Berman
Reviews.Content: Broke immediately did not even have it a month and the LCD is non-responsive. Awesome. Worst 250 i ever spent.

Reviews.Title: Perfect !!!!
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: This item was received on time and in very good condition.  We are extremely pleased with this purchase.  The Apple iPhone 4 is being used by my son and he is very pleased with this purchase.  No complaints from our teenager.

Reviews.Title: Fast, easy , happy
Reviews.Author: Norberto R.
Reviews.Content: Phone was in excellent condiction and came with a free case and charger and I couldn't be any happier then I thought

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4 "new" came in an iPhone 5s box.
Reviews.Author: Kirby
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 12-31-13 and it arrived on1-4-14. Pretty good considering the holiday. The phone is an iPhone 4, but it came in an iPhone 5s box with some cellophane on half of the box. The phone has absolutely no marks, nicks, dings, scratches or any indications of being used (other than a text from an area code from which it came and an iCloud pass-code). I would assume this phone was a floor model, or display model that may have been refurbished. The phone came with all the plastics on it. The wall charger was new, as were the apple head phones, but the cord was definitely used. And there was no user's manual(not that I use them) So I am not sure how this is considered a new phone, but I am pleased with it at this time. I put my sim card in it from my old windows phone and it works great. For what I paid and how nice the phone is I can't complain to much. If it had the manual, new USB and original box this seller would have gotten 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4 8GB
Reviews.Author: ernesto castellon
Reviews.Content: i bought in total 50 iphone by new, but some are refurbishing, and when i try to unlock they have contract with att and i have to pay more for unlocked and other there is not posible unlock

Reviews.Title: Camera lens is scratched
Reviews.Author: KLR
Reviews.Content: The seller was easy to work with.  I ordered one phone and it worked great at first, but then the screen was glitchy.  I contacted the seller and they were very quick to respond and replaced the phone.  However, the replacement phone has a scratch on the camera lens and all the pictures have a foggy spot on them.  I decided to keep the phone but not 100% satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Decent enough.
Reviews.Author: Taylor Foster
Reviews.Content: The phone was in decent enough condition externally, but the front facing camera didn't work, and it didn't vibrate! After opening it up (quite a few internal screws were missing) I found that tightening the screws and reattaching the cords around the vibrator fixed that problem, but nothing could be done about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase to avoid a long contract with a carrier
Reviews.Author: Brendan O'Connor
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who was getting her first phone.  I didn't want to get the newest version with a long contract because we were not sure she was at the age to keep the phone and wanted to make sure she was responsible and took care of it before that kind of commitment.  By purchasing this, I was able to add a line to my existing carrier with no additional product and the phone has been wonderful.  Hopefully, this should last long enough for here to get an upgrade eventually and allow her to be aware enough to decide if she wants an Apple, Android or Windows phone.

Reviews.Title: Probably worth it.
Reviews.Author: George "George"
Reviews.Content: The phone looks new but it is kind of weird, my face pushes buttons while I talk. It is still a real nice phone and a good deal but not perfect new.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4  AT&T; with iOS 7 Review
Reviews.Author: kyle
Reviews.Content: The phone was in perfect cosmetic condition but I was not able to activate it due to Apple's new security. I think before an iPhone is sold on Amazon, it should have the Apple ID taken off of it through iCloud.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Verena16
Reviews.Content: The phone shipped fast , it came in very good condition & I love it so much ! I'm so happy I bought it, it's so worth the money!

Reviews.Title: overall good phone
Reviews.Author: Mendy Stiffler
Reviews.Content: It was in great condition and worked great! the charger it came with stopped working within a few days but i got a new one for cheap. also the home button rotated where the square was after a week it rotated where it looked like a diamond and sometimes didnt respond but over all it was a good phone. For anyone thats looking to purchase an iphone though make sure you set up an icloud account and figure out how to get the find my phone app if it was to ever get stolen. i set mine down on the rack at the mall to sit down and put my shoes back on and when i stood up someone reached through the rack and stole it. they couldnt track it because i didnt have the app so make sure you do that!!! but i do recommend buying from this seller

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: Verena16
Reviews.Content: The phone shipped fast , it came in very good condition & I love it so much ! I'm so happy I bought it, it's so worth the money!

Reviews.Title: overall good phone
Reviews.Author: Mendy Stiffler
Reviews.Content: It was in great condition and worked great! the charger it came with stopped working within a few days but i got a new one for cheap. also the home button rotated where the square was after a week it rotated where it looked like a diamond and sometimes didnt respond but over all it was a good phone. For anyone thats looking to purchase an iphone though make sure you set up an icloud account and figure out how to get the find my phone app if it was to ever get stolen. i set mine down on the rack at the mall to sit down and put my shoes back on and when i stood up someone reached through the rack and stole it. they couldnt track it because i didnt have the app so make sure you do that!!! but i do recommend buying from this seller

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4 8GB
Reviews.Author: B. Parker
Reviews.Content: This is a great iPhone. Coming from Android, I got this because I really need the Apple App Store for job apps. It comes with earbuds and a USB cable. I do wish they make it easier to connect to Windows 7. A USB port would make it better but great anyways. Get one

Reviews.Title: Exc
Reviews.Author: Macho
Reviews.Content: Great condition!! Sometimes I have troubles charging it, doesnt recognized the charger and i've tried with different chargers but besides that is great

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: gamer 12340
Reviews.Content: Its the best electronic ive ever bought. I LOVE IT!!!!!!!! ITS like new nothing wrong with it. Its awesome great

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Banditrider
Reviews.Content: Wasn't sure about buying a used phone but didn't want to buy new with a long term contract.  This is my daughter's first phone and I didn't want to be committed to a contract.  I have Consumer Cellular and they sent a free chip (phone had to be AT&T; compatible) and I do plan sharing for $10 per month.  Works great, phone is like new and have had zero problems.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Jazzplayer
Reviews.Content: I am like so very happy to have this iPhone, I've wait a few years for this phone I could not afford to buy a brand new one, so I wait till now but man this is absolutely the best.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: colleen
Reviews.Content: I like the phone and it works pretty well but my proximity sensor is broken which is extremely inconvenient to me and I am constantly muting or hanging up on people with the side of my face. Also the screen is slow to touch.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4 for Mom
Reviews.Author: doug
Reviews.Content: This phone was purchased for my wife and she just adores it she likes it so much better than her Samsung lots of features and she still learning how to download apps from the App Store.

Reviews.Title: good or bad?
Reviews.Author: Victoria W. Joe
Reviews.Content: Shipping was fast and on time but....screen to the iPhone was completely trashed...have to more money into it to get it fixed!i don't know if iPhone was sold as is or maybe its because the box was crushed during the shipping process.. IDK. Hopefully I'll get another iPhone in a way better shape if I consider ordering again...

Reviews.Title: New Apple Iphone 4 8GB
Reviews.Author: Timothy Bennett
Reviews.Content: Received the 'NEW' Apple I-Phone 4 and it was not sealed in the package, key was missing and phone would not charge. I sent it back and received a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4 8gb (white) ATT
Reviews.Author: Clifton Gerald Hibbert
Reviews.Content: iPhone clean.I like it because its white and clean.I would recommend this for others such as family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Barrieclark "BWC"
Reviews.Content: I love this Phone =) well made work's smooth apple is the best I want to order another one soon

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: B Lenard
Reviews.Content: Used this phone for an out of country phone. Worked great, still works great! Just popped in my sim card and was using it France with no issue. Nice find great price. Did arrive one day late with prime :(

Reviews.Title: I'm thrilled!!
Reviews.Author: Amber Ray
Reviews.Content: This phone was the answer to my prayers!!  It is in excellent condition, as advertised, and works perfectly!  I am so happy that I made this purchase. :)

Reviews.Title: Great phone just stopped working.
Reviews.Author: Katrina Allen
Reviews.Content: The phones mic stopped working. I am no longer able to talk over the phone. I did like how it looked, just wish that it would have worked better.

Reviews.Title: works just like new
Reviews.Author: Whitney
Reviews.Content: I dont know why anyone would spend money on buying a whole new phone, this one works great and you wouldnt even know it was used.

Reviews.Title: SORRY THE NEW IOS SYSTEMS SUCKS!!!
Reviews.Author: Love Amazon
Reviews.Content: This phone has a horrible camera!!!  The new IOS system is useless.  Everything stupid from the previous I-Phone 4.  When Apple upgraded they used a dumb brain because they destroyed some great mechanism for user friendly phone use.  This phone is by far the worse I have ever used.  MY OLD FLIP PHONE HAD A BETTER CAMERA!!!  The pictures are furry and fuzzy and you can't see them as clear as the previous I-PHONE 4.  BIG MISTAKE ORDERING THIS PHONE!!  I figure this is why the guy was selling it!!!  He realized it SUCKED!!!!

Reviews.Title: iPhone replaced for the best!
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: My daughter had cracked her phone and this new one was so awesome! She's so happy with it. It came in a new case with a charger and even came with a personal "Thank you" note. Couldn't be more satisfied!!!

Reviews.Title: It's perfect
Reviews.Author: Cornelius Womble Jr.
Reviews.Content: Even though it has a little scratch on the corner of the screen ,It  still works really really well , with no problem . Overall it's a truly good product .

Reviews.Title: 这是最好的二手iphone我能找到！
Reviews.Author: lijian
Reviews.Content: This was the best used iphone i could find!! It came in a right shape and no scratches. I love it

Reviews.Title: Beats paying the full price
Reviews.Author: bargindealer
Reviews.Content: My daughter had cracked her original iphone pretty bad and of course her upgrade is not due for another year. So we were looking on here for an iPhone at a reasonable price. We found this. Yes my daughter was excited but not so much me.  I purchased the iPhone (refurbished) one for around 150.00. I haven't heard of any complaints about the phone running slow or anything, so we knew we were taking a risk with this. However, when I received the phone it did come with few scratches in the bottom corner of the phone. You just have to take your chances on here, however, its worth buying an iphone at the full price.

Reviews.Title: My review of iPhone 4
Reviews.Author: LaRissa Holloway
Reviews.Content: I like my iPhone 4 but just wanted to know why I cannot hear loudly and clearly whenever someone calls me or I call them! I would be nice to turn the volume up higher. Other than that great phone.

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: carlos johnson
Reviews.Content: The phone didn't work...The phone I was sold could not and would not get any service anywhere!!!! Wasted my money...

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Krista Calabrese
Reviews.Content: works good but my home button is pushed in far so I have to push on it with force, you shouldn't have to do that. ALSO my screen wasn't fully placed in. I had to continuously click it in.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: lindsayanneadtr
Reviews.Content: Phone was still factory sealed! Such a great price for a brand new iphone. Works perfectly! I only have a complaint with the shipping but that was Fedex fault.

Reviews.Title: it is ok
Reviews.Author: Zhou B.
Reviews.Content: Overall is good, but is can't use headphones, so should also is normal, second-hand also is such,Suggest or not to buy second-hand, more buy a new one

Reviews.Title: It's good
Reviews.Author: Anh
Reviews.Content: I checked the phone but do not use it yet. However, I can see it is as good as I expected.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: I love my phone!
Reviews.Author: Danielle Trujillo
Reviews.Content: I have had zero problems. The phone came in looking brand new NO SCRATCHES and i hadn't seen a single photo prior to ordering! thank you so much!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Kathleen M. Howard "Mom of 2"
Reviews.Content: This phone was in perfect condition and I have no complaints.  It came in the original box with all of the cords, headphones, etc.

Reviews.Title: It's worthwhile for you to posses
Reviews.Author: Troy
Reviews.Content: I like this phone. This phone is easy to use. I have used iPhone before and wanted to keep using it. Good first smart phone. Lots of apps and uses besides calling someone. Text, apps, music, games, reading books are all available. I would recommend this to a friend!

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: amazon fan
Reviews.Content: This phone came in perfect condition with ear buds and charger. I bought it for my daughter and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Speed post and right mobile
Reviews.Author: madhavan
Reviews.Content: mint condition , i never get this quality for this price. I would recommend this for anyone looking for wants Apple iphone

Reviews.Title: Bought it used and cheap
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Phone was in excellent condition but did not work for making calls. The price was so good, we decided to use it as an Ipod. The wifi was outstanding. It just would not make or receive calls.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: terrica   kyle
Reviews.Content: It was nice no scratches it looks brand new. it works good  good everything is functioning the way it supposed too. i would buy another phone from them again with no problem. I love my new i-phone thanks and it was fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Love my phone
Reviews.Author: kimberlee
Reviews.Content: Because I like the phone and all it's features and I love how you can see people typing if they have an iPhone

Reviews.Title: not unlock
Reviews.Author: Adrianna Mackey
Reviews.Content: phone was in the unlock section of the cell phones however the  phone was not unlock it would not work with my carrier thus i had to pay extra funds to have the phone factory unlock. Total rip off Do Not Purchase phone

Reviews.Title: I guess it is okay
Reviews.Author: Ty
Reviews.Content: I did take the phone to an AT&T; store to get it activated and they checked it out thoroughly and stated, "It could have possibly had slight water damage due to the inside where the ear connecter jack is pink". Other than that the phone is working properly.

Reviews.Title: iphone 4
Reviews.Author: Jaymi Garcia
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what to expect when I ordered the iphone.  But, when I got it, it was great!!!  If anybody is looking for an iphone I recommend going through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: the phone is in great condition and easy to use.  the battery last longer than I thought. would buy again

Reviews.Title: New just like the seller said
Reviews.Author: Cristhian Rivadeneira
Reviews.Content: is very good to know that you can buy with confidence because what vendors placed as characteristics of their products are true even though in this case I have some problems to use my phone in Ecuador believe this all within normal and hopefully as and I are reviewing the phone unlocked from aT & T soon to say that buying the iphone was fully expected

Reviews.Title: what the hell bro
Reviews.Author: carlos hawkins
Reviews.Content: the phone diss guy sold  mee it was in good condiction but the phone waz locked and I dont no how to unlock it thums down for diss guy

Reviews.Title: Iphone4
Reviews.Author: piyush
Reviews.Content: Not happy with iphone4, its hang very fast....really not happy after spending lots of dollars and no headphones with it too.

Reviews.Title: Daughter
Reviews.Author: Generous Teacher
Reviews.Content: My daughter broke her iPhone and had to have a new one. We initially ordered a black phone but it was a Verizon phone. We quickly returned it and got the white one. It works great!

Reviews.Title: iphone 4 not 4s
Reviews.Author: nury Herrera
Reviews.Content: im not saying this is a bad product or a good one i havent bought it yet but this is an iphone 4 not iphone4s a 4s means its faster so its ok if it slow but it shoudn't be that slow

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: Mark Fritz
Reviews.Content: The phone quit working about 2 weeks after I received it. It would not turn on and still does not.

Reviews.Title: The I Phone 4 is excellent
Reviews.Author: jagertom
Reviews.Content: The phone works as expected and all the features I need are available.I like the size and weight and the clear screen.  It easily connects to my Wi-Fi and Bluetooth in my car.  All the features I need are great.
